title: As a project manager, I want to create and manage projects so that I can organize team work effectively
description: The project manager needs a comprehensive interface to create new projects, set up project details, define scope and goals, and manage project lifecycle.
acceptanceCriteria: User can create a new project with name, description, and scope
User can add and remove project goals
User can update project status (active, completed, on-hold, cancelled)
User can view project overview with key metrics

title: As a developer, I want to create user stories so that I can define feature requirements clearly
description: Developers need to be able to create detailed user stories with acceptance criteria to properly define what needs to be built.
acceptanceCriteria: User can create user stories with title and description
User can add multiple acceptance criteria
User can set story priority (low, medium, high)
User can assign stories to projects

title: As a team member, I want to break down stories into tasks so that work can be tracked granularly
description: Team members need to create specific tasks from user stories to make work manageable and trackable.
acceptanceCriteria: User can create tasks linked to user stories
User can assign tasks to team members
User can set task deadlines and priorities
User can update task status through drag-and-drop

title: As a customer, I want to browse products easily so that I can find what I'm looking for quickly
description: The mobile app needs an intuitive product browsing experience with search and filtering capabilities.
acceptanceCriteria: App displays products in grid/list view
User can search products by name or category
User can filter products by price, rating, and availability
App shows product images, prices, and ratings clearly

title: As a customer, I want to make secure payments so that I can complete purchases confidently
description: The payment system must be secure, reliable, and support multiple payment methods.
acceptanceCriteria: App supports credit/debit cards and digital wallets
Payment information is encrypted and secure
User receives confirmation after successful payment
App handles payment failures gracefully
